name: Lucia Šimková
title: Project Manager, Pixelmate
feedback: What sets Daniel apart is his exceptional project management skills combined with technical excellence. He consistently delivers high-quality code while maintaining clear communication and meeting deadlines. His ability to anticipate potential challenges and propose solutions before they become problems has been invaluable. The way he handles project scope, technical debt, and documentation demonstrates a level of professionalism that's rare to find. We're already planning our next collaboration.
